name: @redstone-finance/fuel-connector
description: A tool to inject RedStone data into Fuel compatible smart contracts

scripts.contract: make contract && fuels typegen -i "sway/contract/out/debug/prices-abi.json" -o "src/autogenerated" && cp sway/contract/out/debug/prices.bin "src/autogenerated"
scripts.pack-package: yarn build && cd dist && npm pack
